title: CodeEdit
description: CodeEdit, a lightweight, natively built editor for macOS. Open source. Free forever.

/.title: Overview
/.description: A lightweight, natively built editor. Open source. Free forever.

/whats-new.title: What's New
/whats-new.description: Discover the newest updates, features, and bug fixes in CodeEdit's latest releases. Explore what's new and download builds for any version.

/blog.title: Blog
/blog.description: The CodeEdit blog is the source for news about CodeEdit. Read project news, get updates, and read about community progress.

/download.title: Download
/download.description: Download CodeEdit. A lightweight, natively built editor. Open source. Free forever.

updates.title: Updates
updates.description: Get the latest news on our code editor, including new releases and upcoming features, keeping you in the loop with our project's progress.

insights.title: Insights
insights.description: Explore the nuts and bolts of our development process, offering a behind-the-scenes look at the challenges and solutions that power our project.

spotlights.title: Contributor Spotlights
spotlights.description: Celebrate the individuals who make our project possible, highlighting their contributions, stories, and the impact they have on our community.

tutorials.title: Tutorials
tutorials.description: Explore a wide range of tutorials that not only guide you through mastering our code editor but also delve into general coding tutorials to elevate your development skills.

user-voices.title: User Voices
user-voices.description: Hear firsthand from our users about how our code editor enhances their coding journey, with personal anecdotes, innovative usage tips, and custom setup guides.

news.title: News
news.description: Stay informed with updates and insights on the latest in tech, software development, and how these trends impact our project and community.
